definitions.definition: Amount of money , time, etc. that is required or used.
examples: The total cost of the new complex was an estimated $1.5 million.
We have to cut costs if we want to avoid bankruptcy.
The average cost of a new house is twice as much as it was 20 years ago.

definitions.definition: A negative consequence or loss that occurs or is required to occur.
examples: Spending all your time working may earn you a lot of money at the cost of your health.
The army won the battle decisively, but at a cost of many lives.

main_definition: Amount of money , time, etc. that is required or used.
secondary_definitions: A negative consequence or loss that occurs or is required to occur.

definitions.definition: ( obsolete ) Manner ; way ; means ; available course ; contrivance . (Can we add an example for this sense?)
Quality ; condition ; property ; value ; worth ; a wont or habit ; disposition ; nature ; kind ; characteristic .

main_definition: ( obsolete ) Manner ; way ; means ; available course ; contrivance . (Can we add an example for this sense?)
